articles.title: Floral Basket Laid before Portrait of Kim Il Sung in Cuba

articles.content:
Floral Basket Laid before Portrait of Kim Il Sung in Cuba 
    Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) --A ceremony of laying a floral basket before a portrait of President Kim Il Sung was held at Kim Il Sung Economic College in Cuba on September 9 on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of the DPRK.
 Present at the ceremony were teachers and employees of the college, officials of the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples, the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and embassy officials.    
 They laid the floral basket before the portrait of Kim Il Sung before paying tribute to him.
